items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it!
items.body: So cute! Very nice quality. Soft with great drape, so cozy! Read more
items.author: Kelly Cretelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and Comfortable Sleepwear
items.body: This cami pajama set is incredibly soft and comfortable, making it perfect for a good night’s sleep. The modal fabric feels gentle against the skin, and the lace trim adds a touch of elegance without compromising comfort. The adjustable straps ensure a customizable fit, and the shorts have just the right amount of looseness for ease of movement. After multiple washes, the set has maintained its shape and softness, indicating good durability. Considering the quality and comfort, this pajama set offers excellent value for its price. Read more
items.author: Angie Sutil

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, sexy, and comfortable
items.body: This pajama set is soft, sexy, and sized correctly. I ordered a size medium and the shorts and shirt fit perfectly. I am 5’9 145lbs. I love the flowery design, and it doesn’t feel or look cheap. I have not tested wash/drying options yet but I’ll absolutely update if anything negative happens. I believe it is a cotton/poly blend. It is perfect for warmer nights and it’s very comfortable. Some people might be bothered by the lace at the top but I didn’t find it to be scratchy or problematic. I felt very cute and sexy, without being uncomfortable which is a win/win. Read more
items.author: Emily

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy set
items.body: I love this set , it just runs a tad small I think. I got a large and the top seems like more of a medium. It's fine really just not much room. I'm 36DD. Bottom is perfect. Nice and comfy and a little sexy. 5'3 157 for reference. Read more
items.author: C.E

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute set
items.body: Love this set. The top is just tight enough to keep the girls in place and the material in comfortable. When washed the little lace wants to roll up but that doesn’t bother me. Read more
items.author: Gail

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for curvy bodies!
items.body: for reference im 4 foot 10 inches and weigh 220 pounds! and i have a ddd bust and big hips! so cute and comfy! i was so worried these wouldnt fit because im a big person but it fits super well and is very flattering! form fitting but has a lot of stretch and the fabric is super soft, my partner thought i looked super cute, and i felt really confident! its hard to find cute plus size clothing but this really really worked well and fits good! hopefully it holds up when i wash it Read more
items.author: olive beyer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but seems low quality
items.body: This is a cute and soft pajama set, but the quality did not hold up over time. After just a few washes, the fabric pilled up. I will say though it's comfortable to wear, the colors are bright, and it looked cute when I was wearing it. If you decide to buy this set, I would not recommend washing it with the rest of your clothes and it may help to maintain the quality of the fabric. Read more
items.author: Allison G.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: The fit is great, they're super cute & very comfortable. I will be ordering more colors & prints. Read more
items.author: Brandi

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Gold Chain, Army Green, Black White, Brown Leopard, Small Crushed Flowers, 1-black, Medium Grey, Halloween Black, Red Flower, Christmas Red, Red Plaid, Little Red Heart, White Love Heart, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
